titles: Noah's dove with her olive-branch, or, The happy tidings of the abatement of the flood of England's civil discords as it was delivered in a sermon preached at Preston in the county-palatine of Lancaster on the 24th of May, 1660, being the publick day of thanksgiving for the restoring of His Sacred and Most Excellent Majesty, Charles the Second / by William Cole ...
author: Cole, William.
publisher: Printed by James Cottrel, For Nathanael Webb ...,
notes: Imperfect: stained, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
